answers.answer: Elevate your feet when sleeping.  I got a diuretic from my MD

Depending on if you're a type 1 or 2 diabetic, research what you can do to naturally control your insulin without taking injections or any other form. Here's one link that may help, it's for type 1 - http://www.marksdailyapple.com/type-1-diabetes-paleo-primal/#axzz2KFQkTdtbMuch useful info and it's free at that same website. good health to you :)

question: I take insulin and have noticed my ankles and legs swelling, what can I do?
title: Swelling
